inra.ijpb.binary.geodesic

Interface GeodesicDiameter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Algo
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeodesicDiameterFloat, GeodesicDiameterShort

    public interface GeodesicDiameter
extends Algo
    Interface for computing geodesic diameter of a set of binary or labeled particles or regions. The data types for computation and algorithm implementation are left to implementations.

    Example of use: 

     {
        @code
        float[] weights = ChamferWeights.CHESSKNIGHT.getFloatWeights();
        GeodesicDiameter gd = new GeodesicDiameterFloat(weights);
        ResultsTable table = gd.analyseImage(inputLabelImage);
        table.show("Geodesic Diameter");
 }
    Author:
    dlegland
    See Also:
    GeodesicDiameterShort, GeodesicDiameterFloat
